endpoints.description: Create a new project by defining its name, start date, expected end date, and initial budget details.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific project, including its tasks, resources, and financial metrics.
Add a new task within a project, specifying its title, description, duration, and associated resources.
Update the details of an existing task, such as its timeline, assigned personnel, or dependencies.
List all available resources for allocation, including their current status, availability, and associated costs.
Allocate specific resources to a task or project, ensuring their availability and adjusting schedules as needed.
Generate and retrieve customized reports on project progress, resource utilization, and financial expenditures.
Remove a project and its associated tasks and allocations, freeing up all related resources.
Adjust the budget allocations for a project, including category-specific updates and fund reallocations.
Simulate future project resource needs and budget requirements based on current trends and historical data.
